backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing user registration, authorization mixins, and data storage for profiles, appointments, patients, and leads with per-user maps and timestamps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing addition of the 'Visited' lead status option and listing affected frontend components and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files including components, pages, hooks, and types.
frontend/GO_LIVE.md: Guide outlining prerequisites and step-by-step instructions for deploying the application to the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry for the frontend with PWA metadata, icons, root mount point, and service worker registration.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing asset caching, cache cleanup, and network-first or cache-first strategies for offline support.
frontend/QA_APPOINTMENTS_ID_REGRESSION_T: QA test plan verifying correct appointment edit and delete behavior using stable IDs across schedule lists.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, routing, tab navigation, background sync, and appointment reminder overlay within a React Query provider.
Displays an appointment card with time, patient info, and actions like call, WhatsApp, add patient, delete, and follow‑up.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentDialo: Dialog for creating or editing appointments with form handling, contact picker integration, and validation before submitting changes.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentFeedb: Provides buttons to send WhatsApp feedback requests, validating the number and showing a preview dialog before sending.
frontend/src/components/AppointmentRemin: Full‑screen overlay showing an upcoming appointment reminder with patient, time, notes, and a dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar switching between schedule, patients, leads, and settings tabs.
frontend/src/components/ContactImportRev: Dialog allowing users to review and edit imported contact details before confirming insertion into a form.
frontend/src/components/FollowUpDateTime: Dialog for selecting a date and 12-hour time, converting it to a bigint timestamp, and returning it via onConfirm.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header showing clinic info, sync status, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LeadCard.tsx: Displays a lead with actions for calling, WhatsApp messaging, editing, deleting, and updating status, including follow‑up and expected dates.
frontend/src/components/LeadDialog.tsx: Form dialog for creating or editing a lead, handling contact import, date fields, status, rating, and optional appointment creation.
frontend/src/components/NextAppointmentW: Widget showing the next upcoming appointment or a fallback message if none exist.
frontend/src/components/PatientCard.tsx: Displays patient details with call/WhatsApp actions, image/avatar, delete flow, and an appointment dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/PatientDialog.ts: Dialog component for creating or editing a patient, supporting contact import, camera/photo capture, and image upload.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal for entering and saving the user’s name and clinic name during initial setup.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFeedback: Shows a preview of a WhatsApp feedback message and confirms sending it to a patient.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAwareSync.t: Polls backend change timestamps and invalidates relevant React Query caches when new data is detected.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactPicker.ts: Wraps the Contact Picker API to select a contact’s name and phone number with detailed error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and identity restoration via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLastSync.ts: Tracks and formats the timestamp of the last successful data sync based on React Query cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Schedules and manages appointment reminders using browser notifications or in-app alerts, including permission handling and sound playback.
frontend/src/hooks/useNow.ts: Provides a Date value that updates at a fixed interval, defaulting to once per minute.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as appointments, profiles, leads, and sync timestamps.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyncOnFocus.ts: Empty placeholder file for sync-on-focus logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyncStatus.ts: Tracks whether any key React Query data sources are currently fetching and exposes a boolean sync status.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, transitions, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Contains utility functions for class merging and formatting dates and timestamps into readable strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsTab.tsx: Displays and manages the leads list with sorting, loading states, and a dialog for adding or editing leads.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements the Internet Identity login UI with loading states, error handling, and a welcome screen.
frontend/src/pages/PatientsTab.tsx: Displays a searchable list of patients, handles loading states, and opens a dialog for creating or editing patient records.
frontend/src/pages/ScheduleTab.tsx: Shows today’s, tomorrow’s, and upcoming appointments, with editing, follow‑up scheduling, and a next‑appointment widget.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsTab.tsx: Manages clinic profile settings, manual data sync, PWA install handling, and exports, using multiple backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/WidgetView.tsx: Displays a minimal full‑screen widget showing the next upcoming appointment with time, patient info, and treatment.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for Appointment, Patient, and Lead entities.
frontend/src/utils/leadAnalysis.ts: Provides functions to categorize leads, detect converted leads, and compute analytics using appointments data.
frontend/src/utils/notificationSound.ts: Plays a short notification tone using the Web Audio API.
frontend/src/utils/phone.ts: Normalizes phone numbers by stripping whitespace and common separators.
frontend/src/utils/treatment.ts: Extracts treatment info from notes and offers normalization and comparison utilities for treatments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappFeedback.ts: Generates a preset WhatsApp feedback message, validates mobile numbers, and builds or opens WhatsApp URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state metadata, existing features, and a pending request to add a 'Visited' option to the lead status dropdown.
